name: Pumpkin Party (Brinjaw)
description:
Pumpkin Party

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys -> Movement

Spacebar -> Dash

E -> AoE Ability

Description

A short game I made as part of One Minute Game Jam #8  by warsugs

Theme: Pumpkins

Duration: 01/10/2022 - 06/10/2022

This is my first solo project within a short time frame, and I may hope to make improvements/updates in the future.

Thank you for playing and any feedback is appreciated~
